name: svelte-typewriter
description: A simple and reusable typewriter effect for your Svelte applications
author: Henrique Borges <henriqueborgeshbr@gmail.com>

scripts.postchangelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && cross-env HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 git commit --amend --no-edit --no-verify
scripts.example:dev: yarn --cwd example && yarn --cwd example run dev
scripts.example:build: yarn --cwd example && yarn --cwd example run build
scripts.example:start: yarn example:build && yarn --cwd example run start

hooks.pre-commit: yarn prettier && yarn build && git add .
